alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 04 at 2:53AM PST until February 05 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Strongest in eastern Ventura County and the west and north portions of the San Fernando Valley. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County Coastal Valleys and San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Roadways that may be affected by gusty cross winds include Interstate 5, the 23, 101, 118, 170, 210, and 405 freeways and Highways 14 and 126.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys
